title: Scraper Google Maps
description: This script scrapes business information from Google Maps using Selenium and BeautifulSoup.

title: FastAPI Quiz Project
description: An API for managing quizzes using FastAPI.

title: ci_cd_sentiments_analysis
description: This project sets up an automated CI/CD pipeline to test a sentiment analysis API. The goal is to ensure the proper functioning of the API through unit and integration tests, executed via Docker containers orchestrated by Docker Compose.

title: Trading Bot for cryptocurrency markets
description: A trading bot based on a Machine Learning model that will invest in crypto markets.
